title: 1914 B18 Yellow Blanket Catchers Pose. Nice
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: 1914 B18 Yellow Blanket Catchers Pose. Nice
posts.post_content:
Offered here is an example of a very nice B18 blanket with Yellow basepaths and Pennants. The player is J. Dots Miller of the St Louis Nationals holding a catcher's mitt. The blanket has fantastic color, clarity, registration and 4 full brown borders. The back shows some age toning. Very nice tough blanket to find. Price is net. 5.99 shipping with tracking
Sold
